room_title: Escape room "Avengers VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
room_address: 3377 S Las Vegas Blvd #2235 Las Vegas, NV 89109
room_description: Shuri has recruited your team to test a powerful new prototype design combining Wakandan and Stark technologies. When an enemy from the past seeks to steal the technology, you'll fight alongside some of your favorite Avengers like Doctor Strange, Wasp, Ant-Man and more to stop the attack before they unleash an oppressive new age upon the world.
